content.rendered:
Refund Policy

  • Refund to the Kings Club members will be initiated if the membership account is closed with the credit balance and also the confirmation mail from the club regarding the closure. The entire credit balance is refunded via NEFT to the account details provided by the member, subject to all dues cleared and membership access cards surrendered.
  • For the refund of balance in the members account is initiated when membership is not renewed and also on voluntary withdrawal by member.
  • Only the Credit balance kept in the membership account is applicable for refund. The initial membership fee is non-refundable.
  • However, the detailed Terms and Conditions are provided at the time of booking.
